Reviews.Title: Safer Home
Reviews.Author: Maxine
Reviews.Content: really like my Revo Security system. Like that it scans and records everything going on around and inside our Home and garage.Don't like to have to reset the cameras following a rain storm, also when it rains the color is really bad.

Reviews.Title: Poor Support and Proprietary System
Reviews.Author: John "..."
Reviews.Content: Stay away... Poor support and proprietary system meaning you have to use there software to view over the internet. I have this system and I hate the fact that I can't use any android app have to use there's and it's no good. There are better free one out there but they will not work with there system.There are better and cheaper system out there. I am looking for a new unit now because my REVO will no longer work.

Reviews.Title: Revo 16 Channel Indoor/Outdoor Video Security System
Reviews.Author: Shirlene B. Smith "Shirlene"
Reviews.Content: This was an excellent purchase.  Pictures are clear, was easy to set up.  I can view my whole surroundings.  The only drawback is that the remote does not seem to work.  I may be doing something wrong, if anyone that has this same systems can let me know how the remote is supposed to work i.e. is it supposed to shut off the monitor?Also, how do you set up the remote excess i.e. viewing from  offsight computer or smart phone?

Reviews.Title: Does not work with MAC
Reviews.Author: John Doe
Reviews.Content: This system will not work with Apple products despite what they say.  Remote viewing can only be used with Internet Explorer and The apps for Apple do not work..
